summary.para: Called when the user opens the Text Services control panel application, selects the text service from the list and presses the Properties pushbutton.

param.name: hwndParent
param.para: Handle of the parent window. The text service typically uses this as the parent or owner window when creating a dialog box.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID value that specifies the identifier of the language selected in the Text Services control panel application.

param.name: rguidProfile
param.para: Contains a GUID value that specifies the language profile identifier that the text service is under. This is the value specified in when the profile was added.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method should not return until the user closes the dialog box or property sheet.

summary.para: The ITfFnConfigure interface is implemented by a text service to enable the Text Services control panel application to allow the text service to display a configuration dialog box.
The Text Services control panel application obtains an instance of this interface by calling with the class identifier passed to and IID_ITfFnConfigure.
